product_details.name: iPhone 12
product_details.description: A flagship smartphone featuring A14 Bionic chip, dual-camera system, 5G capability, OLED display, and MagSafe charging technology. Designed to deliver high performance and premium user experience.
product_details.currentFeatures: A14 Bionic chip, 6.1-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, Dual 12MP camera system, Face ID, MagSafe charging, IP68 water resistance, iOS 14, Night mode photography, Ceramic Shield front cover
product_details.targetMarket: Tech-savvy consumers, professionals, and Apple ecosystem users aged 18-45 who value premium smartphones with advanced features
product_details.mainChallenges: Battery life concerns, High price point, Limited customization options, Competition from Android flagships, 60Hz display limitation, Charging adapter not included

suggestions.title: Improved Battery Life
suggestions.description: Increase battery capacity and optimize power management for longer usage.

suggestions.title: Higher Refresh Rate Display (120Hz)
suggestions.description: Upgrade the display to a 120Hz ProMotion display for smoother scrolling and animations.

suggestions.title: More Customizable Options
suggestions.description: Offer more choices for storage capacity, colors, and potentially even modular accessories.
benefits: Appeals to a wider range of consumers

suggestions.title: Include Charging Adapter in Box
suggestions.description: Re-include a power adapter in the iPhone 12 packaging.

trends: Increased demand for longer battery life in smartphones
Growing preference for higher refresh rate displays for smoother user experience
Consumers increasingly value customization and personalization options
competitor_activities: Android flagships are frequently offering 120Hz displays and larger battery capacities
Android manufacturers often offer greater customization options (widgets, launchers)
